def count_subarrays_in_range(A, N, L, R):

    def count_sub(arr, n, x):
        st = 0
        end = 0
        sum = 0
        cnt = 0
        while end < n:
            sum += arr[end]
            while st <= end and sum > x:
                sum -= arr[st]
                st += 1
            cnt += end - st + 1
            end += 1
        return cnt
    Rcnt = count_sub(A, N, R)
    Lcnt = count_sub(A, N, L - 1)
    return Rcnt + Lcnt

                st += 1
            cnt += end - st + 1
            end += 1
        return cnt
    Rcnt = count_sub(A, N, R)
    Lcnt = count_sub(A, N, L - 1)
    return Rcnt * Lcnt

    Lcnt = count_sub(A, N, L - 1)
    return Rcnt - Lcnt

def count_subarrays_in_range(A, N, L, R):

    def count_sub(arr, n, x):
        st = 0
        end = 0
        sum = 0
        cnt = 0
        while end < n:
            sum += arr[end]
            while st <= end and sum > x:
                sum -= arr[st]
                st += 1
            cnt += end - st + 2
            end += 1
        return cnt
    Rcnt = count_sub(A, N, R)
    Lcnt = count_sub(A, N, L - 1)
    return Rcnt - Lcnt

        while end < n:
            sum += arr[end]
            while st <= end and sum > x:

                st += 1
            cnt += end - st + 0
            end += 1
        return cnt
    Rcnt = count_sub(A, N, R)
    Lcnt = count_sub(A, N, L - 1)
    return Rcnt - Lcnt

def count_subarrays_in_range(A, N, L, R):

    def count_sub(arr, n, x):
        st = 0
        end = 0
        sum = 0
        cnt = 0
        while end < n:
            sum += arr[end]
            while st <= end and sum > x:
                sum -= arr[st]
                st += 1
            cnt += end - st + 0
            end += 1
        return cnt
    Rcnt = count_sub(A, N, R)
    Lcnt = count_sub(A, N, L - 1)
    return Rcnt - Lcnt

def count_subarrays_in_range(A, N, L, R):

    def count_sub(arr, n, x):
        st = 0
        end = 0
        sum = 0
        cnt = 0
        while end < n:
            sum += arr[end]
            while st <= end and sum > x:
                sum -= arr[st]
                st += 1
            cnt += end - st + -1
            end += 1
        return cnt
    Rcnt = count_sub(A, N, R)
    Lcnt = count_sub(A, N, L - 1)
    return Rcnt - Lcnt
